div.p: Serving a diverse Central Iowa community, Polk County is among the nation’s most innovative public institutions. We bring together creative leaders, collaborative organizations and key resources to empower our communities and make life better for all people in Polk County.

div.h5: Las Vegas man convicted of second-degree murder in Rico's shooting
div.p: James Mikale Wiggins, 35, argued that he was acting in self-defense when he was entering Rico’s and Tyrone Hutchins, who was also armed, was running out of the bar at 2314 University Ave.

img.alt: Monitoring Water Quality at Easter Lake

div.h5: Monitoring Water Quality at Easter Lake
div.p: During the summer recreation season, Polk County Conservation staff are regularly monitoring the water in Easter Lake, taking samples weekly for testing. Every week on Thursday or Friday, weekly results will be posted here.

img.alt: Older, Wiser, Livelier, Seniors - Great Trees for Iowa Neighborhoods

div.h5: Older, Wiser, Livelier, Seniors - Great Trees for Iowa Neighborhoods
div.p: Join Melissa Burdick, Executive Director of The Brenton Arboretum, for an overview of spectacular tree choices for Iowa neighborhoods. The program will cover a selection of some of the best recommended trees to improve any landscape.

div.h5: UPDATE: Jury convicts Harris of second-degree murder in Drake-area shooting
div.p: Evidence indicated that Tyrell Grimes and Andrew Jerome Harris, 44, argued outside Rico’s at Drake bar and grill.
